A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Such a disappointing movie. Every story arc they got wrong\, every build up they led to a total let down. Luke's character was utterly wrong. Too many dumb sub plots that led nowhere. A sprinkling of SJW propaganda. And way too many dumb slapstick jokes just to entertain the audience. I'd watch episodes 1-3 all day before seeing this movie again.

But hey\, there were flashy lights and CGI.

The music was good.
